context_bundle.summary: Helm Kubernetes package manager: charts bundle K8s manifests with templating (values.yaml, templates/). helm create mychart (scaffold), helm install myrelease mychart (deploy), helm upgrade (update), helm rollback (revert). Values override: --set key=value or -f values.yml. Repositories: helm repo add, helm search. Chart structure: Chart.yaml (metadata), values.yaml (defaults), templates/ (manifests with {{ .Values.key }}).

onboarding.quick_start: Helm workflow: helm create mychart (creates chart structure), edit templates/deployment.yaml with {{ .Values.replicaCount }}, values.yaml with replicaCount: 3. Install: helm install myapp ./mychart or helm install myapp mychart --set replicaCount=5. List: helm list, Status: helm status myapp, Upgrade: helm upgrade myapp ./mychart, Rollback: helm rollback myapp 1. Add repo: helm repo add bitnami https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami, Search: helm search repo nginx, Install from repo: helm install my-nginx bitnami/nginx.
common_patterns: Install with values: helm install myrelease ./mychart -f prod-values.yaml
Install with override: helm install myrelease ./mychart --set replicaCount=5,image.tag=2.0
Repo: helm repo add stable https://charts.helm.sh/stable, helm repo update
